con:property.con:name: CreateBody
UpdateBody

con:restRequest.name: ValidateTransaction
con:restRequest.con:request: { "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "PR", "TransactionNetTotal": 2, "ShippingAndHandling": 10, "TransactionTotalTax": 100, "TransactionNumber": "Tran_${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmss").format(new Date())}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2016 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-1)}", "TransactionEndDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()+3)}", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "Test Transaction 1 for PP", "StoreCode": "PP1501", "GrossAmount": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "ReservationDate": "${ReservationDate#date}", "Nights": 2, "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": ${Amount1#Amt1}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 59, "LineNumber": 1, "TransactionDetailDate": "${TransactionDetailDate#date}" } ] }

con:restRequest.name: Add PurcTransaction
con:restRequest.con:request: { "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "PR", "TransactionNetTotal": 2, "ShippingAndHandling": 10, "TransactionTotalTax": 100, "TransactionNumber": "Tran_${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmss").format(new Date())}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2016 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-1)}", "TransactionEndDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()+3)}", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "Test Transaction 1 for PP", "StoreCode": "PP1501", "GrossAmount": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "ReservationDate": "${ReservationDate#date}", "Nights": 2, "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": ${Amount1#Amt1}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 59, "LineNumber": 1, "TransactionDetailDate": "${TransactionDetailDate#date}" } ] }

con:restRequest.name: Return PurcTransaction1
con:restRequest.con:request: { "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "RT", "TransactionNetTotal": -2, "ShippingAndHandling": -10, "TransactionTotalTax": -100, "TransactionNumber": "RT_${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmss").format(new Date())}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2016 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-1)}", "TransactionEndDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()+3)}", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "Test Transaction 1 for PP", "StoreCode": "PP1501", "GrossAmount": "-52", "ReservationDate": "${ReservationDate#date}", "Nights": 10, "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": -58, "DollarValueGross": -594, "DollarValueNet": -535, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 59, "LineNumber": 1, "TransactionDetailDate": "${TransactionDetailDate#date}", "OriginalTransactionNumber": "${Add PurcTransaction#Response#$['TransactionNumber']}", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Add PurcTransaction#Response#$['TransactionDateTime']}", "OriginalTransactionEndDateTime": "${Add PurcTransaction#Response#$['TransactionEndDateTime']}", "OriginalStoreCode": "PP1501", } ] }

con:restRequest.name: Add PurcTransaction 2
con:restRequest.con:request: { "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "PR", "TransactionNetTotal": 2, "ShippingAndHandling": 10, "TransactionTotalTax": 100, "TransactionNumber": "Tran_${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmss").format(new Date())}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2016 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-1)}", "TransactionEndDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()+3)}", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "Test Transaction 1 for PP", "StoreCode": "PP1501", "GrossAmount": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "ReservationDate": "${ReservationDate#date}", "Nights": 2, "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": ${Amount1#Amt1}, "DollarValueGross": ${DollarValueGross#DollarGross}, "DollarValueNet": ${DollarValueNet#DollarNet}, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 59, "LineNumber": 1, "TransactionDetailDate": "${TransactionDetailDate#date}" } ] }

con:restRequest.name: Return PurcTransaction 2
con:restRequest.con:request: { "ProfileId": "${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "TransactionTypeCode": "RT", "TransactionNetTotal": -2, "ShippingAndHandling": -10, "TransactionTotalTax": -100, "TransactionNumber": "RT_${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmss").format(new Date())}", "CurrencyCode": "USD", "PostingDateTime": "3/30/2016 12:00:00 AM", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()-1)}", "TransactionEndDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ').format(new Date()+3)}", "OnlyAddTransData": "FALSE", "SuspendTransaction": "FALSE", "TransactionDescription": "Test Transaction 1 for PP", "StoreCode": "PP1501", "GrossAmount": "-52", "ReservationDate": "${ReservationDate#date}", "Nights": 10, "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": -58, "DollarValueGross": -594, "DollarValueNet": -535, "ItemNumber": "SKU-00070", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "S", "Quantity": 59, "LineNumber": 1, "TransactionDetailDate": "${TransactionDetailDate#date}", "OriginalTransactionNumber": "${Add PurcTransaction#Response#$['TransactionNumber']}", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Add PurcTransaction#Response#$['TransactionDateTime']}", "OriginalTransactionEndDateTime": "${Add PurcTransaction#Response#$['TransactionEndDateTime']}", "OriginalStoreCode": "PP1501", } ] }
